title: Star Wars: The Bad Batch - 'Common Ground' and 'Devil's Deal' Discussion | Escape the Galaxy
description:
This week on Escape the Galaxy, Marty, Rachel and Omar discuss the latest episodes of The Bad Batch, 'Common Ground' and 'Devil's Deal'.
